document_name: UNDP Support to Health Sector in Limpopo
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ZAF/Project Document Phase 3 UNDP Support to Health Sector in Limpopo- SIGNED.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Recruitment of UNV medical professionals in partnership with UNV Bonn for the provincial Department of Health in Limpopo. The programme is envisaged to improve on health service delivery and doctor-patient ratio especially in rural areas and previously disadventaged communities. The programme involves capacity building and skills tranfer to local medical professionals, knowledge sharing and promoting volunteerism .

project_descr: Phase 3 is an extension of Phase 1 and 2 of the project: UNV Support to the Health Sector in Limpopo, the objective of which is UNV/UNDP assistance to the Government of South Africa to improve health care service delivery in Limpopo Province
project_title: UNDP Support to the Health Sector in Limpopo Phase 3
